SELECT a.ordDate, c.thumb1, c.company, c.prodName, a.ordCount, a.ordNo, a.ordTotPrice, a.deliveryStatus FROM km_product_order AS a JOIN km_product_order_item AS b ON a.ordNo = b.ordNo JOIN km_product AS c ON b.prodNo = c.prodNo WHERE ordUid = #{uid} AND ordDate BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{periodNum} #{period}) AND NOW() ORDER BY ordDate DESC;
